name: Avanta Esthetic Clinic
description:
🔬 Overview: A leader in esthetic medicine in Armenia, Avanta offers a wide range of services including cosmetic dentistry, dermatology, laser hair removal, and facial rejuvenation.
🌍 Specialties: Hollywood smile makeovers, non-surgical facelifts, skin resurfacing.
📍 Why choose them? Modern equipment, multilingual staff, and personalized treatment plans.
